creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey and Mrs. C. D. Velie
inscription:
Signature and Inscription 

LR in dark brown: [to my friend McKim. John S. Sargent]
signed: LR in brown: [John S. Sargent] (see inscription)
text: The words "to McKim" on the canvas refer to Charles Follen McKim, a close friend of Sargent's. He was a member of McKim, Mead and White, the New York architectural firm that designed the original 1914 Minneapolis Institute of Art building.
title: Luxembourg Gardens at Twilight
